channel.title: [pi] donator
channel.description:
how do i get like a donator pin. so that if people donator for a donator pin, they get the code which makes them automatically a donator..
example- if you played near reality, you will understand what i mean.

item.title: [pi] donator
item.dc:creator: @Sup22211 Sup22211
item.description:
@Sup22211 wrote:

Oh yes so do this:
make a boolean;

public boolean isDonator = false;

When people donate make a auto :

addItem(lampID, 1);

and add this on the lamp ID button click…

if(isDonator){ //if donator is true
//I ADDED THIS LINE ^^ BECUASE IF SOME ONE WILL GET A LAMP IN A MISTIRIOUS WAY (DUPING OR SOMETHING) THE LAMP WONT WORK FOR HIM CAUSE HE IS NOT A DONATOR
isDonator = true;
c.sendMessage("You see? donating will give you alot of new options!. You are not a donator!");
}else
c.sendMessage("MUHAHAHA, how did you get this lamp? it only for donators.. HACKER..");
}

Read full topic
